data.title: Facebook’s Libra pitches to be the future of money
data.desc: It is a hugely ambitious - some might say megalomaniacal - project to create a new global currency. Facebook's David Marcus tells me it is about giving billions of people more freedom with money and righting the many wrongs of the present system.
